participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, Emily enjoys engaging in conversations about food and pets.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

participant_2.personality: Adventurous and resourceful, Jason loves nature and enjoys sharing his knowledge of survival skills.
participant_2.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.
